name: Sailor
description: You spent years aboard a ship, working as a deckhand, navigator, or even first mate. The open sea taught you agility, sharp awareness, and how to handle yourself in a rough-and-tumble brawl.

features.name: Tavern Brawler
features.description: You deal 1d4 enhanced Unarmed Strike damage. When you hit with your Unarmed Strike as part of the Attack action, you can make one Unarmed Strike as a Bonus Action. You have proficiency with improvised weapons.
